message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $14,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested, but $14,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $10,500?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your price point.  I'm willing to come down to $12,000.  This still allows me to make a fair profit while ensuring the product is a great value for you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for coming down. I'm getting closer to what I can afford.  How about $11,000?
